question: Which country Sign MoU with India for Enhanced Cooperation in Healthcare?
explanation: India and Morocco signed a MoU for enhanced cooperation in the health sector in New Delhi. Shri J P Nadda, Union Minister of Health & Family Welfare and Dr Abdelkader Amara, Ministry of Health, Kingdom of Morocco signed the MoU. The main areas of cooperation include the following: Non-communicable diseases, including child cardiovascular diseases and cancer; Drug Regulation and Pharmaceutical quality control; Maternal, child and neonatal health; Hospital twinning for the exchange of good practices.
